projects.name: Lone Wolf
projects.description: Group project of a 2-person crew. This is a mobile-first workout application built using MERN stack. Users can sign in, watch gif tutorials of exercises, build their customized workouts, and track their progress on a dashboard. I was responsible for login, database, server and routes, and the dashboard.
projects.keywords: MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js, Auth0, React-Vis

projects.name: Scout 19
projects.description: Group project of a 4-person crew. The application shows up to date coivd-19 case counts on national and state levels. App includes a colored US map displaying state covid grade, as well as a 14 days positive cases chart on state level. I was responsible for the covid-data api and the line graphs.

projects.name: Project Exodus
projects.description: Group project of a 6-person crew. A text adventure game featuring an original horror story. Game incorporates background music, interactive user scenerios and a cloud database. I was responsible for server, routes and database.

projects.name: Llamacorn Resident Directory
projects.description: A React web application featuring Animal Crossing video game characters and their information such as species and personalities. The app gets information from a third party api and allows sorting and filtering functions of the characters.
projects.keywords: React, Third Party APIs, Responsive Web Designs

projects.name: Weather Dashboard
projects.description: Search for any city on the globe and save to a favorite list. Features a five day forecast.
projects.keywords: Bootstrap, Responsive/ Mobile Web Design, APIs

projects.name: Eat-Da-Burger
projects.description: A simple web application allowing CRUD operations on a cloud MySQL database.
projects.keywords: Express Server, CRUD, MySQL, Handlebars Template Engine
